Question: Dongguan Imlong Electronic Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Imlong Electronic Limited

Product 1: Computer Peripherals

 - Manufacture of computer peripheral products
 - 15 years of experience in the industry
 - Offers OEM & ODM services
 - Produces mice, speakers, presenters, hubs, USB sound cards
 - Serves over 30 countries worldwide
 - Verified and credible supplier with a focus on quality control and R&D capabilities
Summary_cn:
东莞市艾姆隆电子有限公司

产品1：电脑外设

- 生产电脑外设产品
- 在该行业拥有15年的经验
- 提供OEM和ODM服务
- 生产鼠标、音箱、演示器、集线器、USB声卡
- 为全球30多个国家提供服务
- 经过验证和可靠的供应商，专注于质量控制和研发能力
